Verses: 1 seyalththiyelin Kumaaranaagiya Serubaabelodum Yesuvaavodum Vandha Aasaariyarum Leviyarum Yaarendraal: Seraayaa, Eremiyaa, Esraa,
2 amariyaa, Mallook, Aththoos,
3 seganiyaa, Rekoom, Meremodh,
4 iththo, Kinedho, Abiyaa,
5 miyaamin, Maadhiyaa, Pilkaa,
6 semaayaa, Yoyaarip, Yedhaayaa,
7 sallu, Aamok, Ilkkiyaa, Yedhaayaa Enbavargal; Ivargal Yesuvaavin Naatkalil, Aasaariyarukkum Thangal Sagodhararukkum Thalaivaraayirundhaargal.
8 leviyar Yaarendraal: Yesuvaa Pinnooyi, Kadhmiyel, Serebiyaa, Yoodhaa, Maththaniyaa Enbavargal; Ivanum Ivan Sagodhararum Thudhiseydhalai Visaariththaargal.
9 pakpukkiyaa, Unni Engira Avargal Sagodharar Avargalukku Edhire Kaavalkaaththirundhaargal.
10 yesuvaa Yoyakeemaip Petraan, Yoyakeem Eliyaasibaip Petraan, Eliyaasip Yoyadhaavaip Petraan.
11 yoyadhaa Yonaththaanaip Petraan, Yonaththaan Yadhuvaavaip Petraan.
12 yoyakeemin Naatkalile Pidhaa Vamsangalin Thalaivaraana Aasaariyargal Yaarendraal: Seraayaavin Sandhadhiyil Meraayaa, Eremiyaavin Sandhadhiyil Ananiyaa,
13 esraavin Sandhadhiyil Mesullaam, Amariyaavin Sandhadhiyil Yoganaan,
14 meliguvin Sandhadhiyil Yonaththaan, Sepaniyaavin Sandhadhiyil Yoseppu,
15 aareemin Sandhadhiyil Adhnaa, Meraayodhin Sandhadhiyil Elkaai,
16 iththovin Sandhadhiyil Sagariyaa, Kinedhonin Sandhadhiyil Mesullaam,
17 abiyaavin Sandhadhiyil Sikri, Miniyaameen, Movadhiyaa Enbavargalin Sandhadhiyil Pildhaai,
18 pilkaavin Sandhadhiyil Sammuvaa, Semaayaavin Sandhadhiyil Yonaththaan.
19 yoyaaripin Sandhadhiyil Maththanaa, Yedhaayaavin Sandhadhiyil Oosi,
20 sallaayin Sandhadhiyil Kallaai, Aamokkin Sandhadhiyil Eper,
21 ilkkiyaavin Sandhadhiyil Asabiyaa, Yedhaayaavin Sandhadhiyil Nedhaneyel Enbavargal.

22 eliyaasipin Naatkalil Yoyadhaa, Yoganaan, Yadhuvaa Engira Leviyar Pidhaa Vamsangalin Thalaivaraaga Ezhudhappattaargal; Persiyanaagiya Thariyuvin Raajyabaaramattum Irundha Aasaariyargalum Appadiye Ezhudhappattaargal;
23 levi Puththiraraagiya Pidhaa Vamsangalin Thalaivar Eliyaasipin Kumaaranaagiya Yoganaanin Naatkalmattum Naalaagamap Pusthagaththil Ezhudhappattaargal.

24 leviyarin Thalaivaraagiya Asabiyaavum, Serebiyaavum, Kadhmiyelin Kumaaran Yesuvaavum, Avargalukku Edhire Nirkira Avargal Sagodhararum, Dhevanudaiya Manushanaagiya Dhaaveedhinudaiya Karpanaiyinpadiye Thudhikkavum, Thoththirikkavum, Oruvarukkoruvar Edhirmugamaaga Muraimuraiyaayirundhaargal.
25 maththaniyaa, Pakpukkiyaa, Opadhiyaa, Mesullaam, Thalmon, Akkoop Enbavargal Vaasalgalilirukkira Pokkisha Araigalaik Kaavalkaakkiravargalaayirundhaargal.
26 yodhsadhaakkin Kumaaranaagiya Yesuvaavin Kumaaran Yoyakeemin Naatkalilum, Adhipadhiyaagiya Negemiyaavum, Vedhapaaraganaagiya Esraa Ennum Aasaariyanum Irukkira Naatkalilum Avargal Irundhaargal.

27 erusalemin Alangaththaip Pradhishtaipannugaiyil, Thudhiyinaalum, Paadalinaalum Kaiththaalam Thamburu Suramandalam Mudhalaana Keedhavaaththiyangalinaalum, Pradhishtaiyai Magizhchchiyode Kondaada Ellaa Idangalilum Irukkira Leviyarai Erusalemukku Varumpadi Thedinaargal.
28 appadiye Paadagarin Puththirar Erusalemin Sutruppurangalaana Samaboomiyilum, Neththobaaththiyarin Graamangalilum,
29 pedhkilkaalilum, Kebaa, Asmaavedh Oorgalin Naattuppurangalilumirundhuvandhu Koodinaargal; Paadagar Erusalemai Sutrilum Thangalukkuk Graamangalaik Kattiyirundhaargal.
30 aasaariyarum Leviyarum Thangalai Suththampannikkondu, Janaththaiyum Pattanavaasalgalaiyum Alangaththaiyum Suththampanninaargal.

31 appozhudhu Naan Yoodhaavin Prabukkalai Alangaththinmel Erappanni, Thudhiseydhu Nadandhupogumpadi Irandu Periya Koottaththaarai Niruththinen; Avargalil Oru Koottaththaar Alangaththinmel Valadhupuramaagak Kuppaimettu Vaasalukkup Ponaargal.
32 avargal Piragaale Osaayaavum, Yoodhaavin Prabukkalil Paadhipperum,
33 asariyaa, Esraa, Mesullaam,
34 yoodhaa, Benyameen, Semaayaa, Eremiyaa Enbavargalum,

35 poorigaigalaip Pidikkira Aasaariyarin Puththiraril Aasaappin Kumaaran Sakkoorin Maganaagiya Migaayaavukkuk Kumaaranaana Maththaniyaavin Magan Semaayaavukkup Pirandha Yonaththaanin Kumaaran Sagariyaavum,

36 dhevanudaiya Manushanaagiya Dhaaveedhin Keedhavaaththiyangalai Vaasikkira Avan Sagodhararaana Semaayaa, Asareyel, Milaalaai, Kilaalaai, Magaai, Nedhaneyel, Yoodhaa, Anaani Enbavargalum Ponaargal; Vedhapaaraganaagiya Esraa Ivargalukku Munbaaga Nadandhaan.

37 angeyirundhu Avargal Thangalukku Edhiraana Oorunivaasalukku Vandhapodhu, Alangaththaippaarkkilum Uyaramaana Dhaaveedhu Nagaraththin Padigalil Eri, Dhaaveedhu Veettinmelaagak Kizhakkeyirukkira Thanneer Vaasalmattum Ponaargal.

38 thudhiseygira Irandaam Koottaththaar Edhireyirukkira Vazhiyaai Nadandhuponaargal, Avargal Piragaale Naan Ponen; Janaththil Paadhipper Alangaththinmel Soolaigalin Kommaiyaikkadandhu, Agazh Madhilmattum Nedugappoi,
39 eppiraayeem Vaasalaiyum, Pazhaiyavaasalaiyum, Meen Vaasalaiyum, Anaaneyelin Kommaiyaiyum, Meyaa Engira Kommaiyaiyum Kadandhu, Aattuvaasalmattum Purappattuk Kaavalveettuvaasalile Nindraargal.
40 adharkuppinbu Thudhi Seygira Irandu Koottaththaarum Dhevanudaiya Aalayaththile Vandhu Nindraargal; Naanum Ennodekooda Irukkira Thalaivaril Paadhipperum,
41 poorigaigalaip Pidikkira Eliyaakkeem, Maaseyaa, Miniyaameen, Migaayaa, Eliyonaai, Sagariyaa, Anaaniyaa Engira Aasaariyargalum,
42 maaseyaa, Semaayaa, Eleyaasaar, Oosi, Yoganaan, Malkiyaa, Elaam, Eser Enbavargalum Nindrom; Paadagarum Avargal Visaarippukkaaranaagiya Yesharagiyaavuma Saththamaaip Paadinaargal.

43 annaalile Migudhiyaana Paligalai Seluththi, Dhevan Thangalukku Magaa Sandhoshaththai Undaakkinadhinaal Magizhchchiyaayirundhaargal; Sthreegalum Pillaigalunkoodak Kalikoorndhaargal; Erusalemin Kalippu Dhooraththile Ketkappattadhu.

44 andraiyadhinam Pokkishangalaiyum, Padaippugalaiyum, Mudhal Kanigalaiyum, Thasamapaagangalaiyum Vaikkum Araigalinmel, Aasaariyargalukkum Leviyargalukkum Nyaayappramaanaththinpadiye Varavendiya Pattanangaludaiya Nilangalin Pangugalai Avaigalil Serkkumpadikku, Sila Manushar Visaarippukkaararaaga Vaikkappattaargal; Oozhiyancheydhu Nirkira Aasaariyarmelum Leviyarmelum Yoodhaa Manidhar Sandhoshamaayirundhaargal.
45 paadagarum, Vaasal Kaavalaalarum, Dhaaveedhum Avan Kumaaranaagiya Saalomonum Karpiththapadiye Thangal Dhevanudaiya Kaavalaiyum, Suththigarippin Kaavalaiyum Kaaththaargal.
46 dhaaveedhum Aasaappum Irundha Poorvanaatkalil Paadagarin Thalaivarum Vaikkappattu, Dhevanukkuth Thudhiyum Thoththirangalum Seluththugira Sangeedhangal Thittampannappattirundhadhu.

47 aagaiyaal Seroobaabelin Naatkalilum, Negemiyaavin Naatkalilum, Isravelar Ellaarum Paadagarukkum Vaasal Kaavalaalarukkum Andraadagath Thittamaagiya Pangugalaik Koduththaargal; Avargal Leviyarukkendru Pradhishtaipannik Koduththaargal; Leviyar Aaronin Puththirarukkendru Avargal Pangaip Pradhishtaipannik Koduththaargal.
